languages.text: "Опасность, впрочем, невелика, а вот возможностей куда больше".
"That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."
languages.original_text: "Опасность, впрочем, невелика, а вот возможностей куда больше".

traits.locale_text: "Although the danger is no big thing — the opportunities are a lot bigger."
"Although the danger is no big thing — the opportunities are a lot bigger."
"That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."
"That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."
"That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."

languages.text: “具体而言，小小的危险，大大的机遇。”
languages.original_text: "That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."

traits.locale_text: “具体而言，小小的危险，大大的机遇。”

languages.text: «Es decir, un riesgo menor para una gran oportunidad».
languages.original_text: "That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."

traits.locale_text: «Es decir, un riesgo menor para una gran oportunidad».

languages.text: 「危険は少ないけど、大きな契機よ」
languages.original_text: "That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."

traits.locale_text: 「危険は少ないけど、大きな契機よ」

languages.text: "Will sagen, geringe Gefahr, aber eine große Gelegenheit."
languages.original_text: "That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Will sagen, geringe Gefahr, aber eine große Gelegenheit."

languages.text: « Le danger reste très modéré, mais l'opportunité, elle, est de taille. »
languages.original_text: "That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."

traits.locale_text: « Le danger reste très modéré, mais l'opportunité, elle, est de taille. »

languages.original_text: "That is, a little danger, but a big opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Tehlike fazla büyük değil ama eşsiz bir fırsat."
